Reviews.Content: expectations property considering location rate highly disappointed beginning kept wandering improve sadly experience airport car departure pay top else location magnificent hk skyline view price warrants checkin faulty checkout balcony private balconys corner suite comfortable cleaning looked hadnt hosed ultimately theres reason pay stay property isnt top 10 ranking major improvements service wise considered leading hotel world sadly return

Reviews.Content: hong kong loves demolishing heritage buildings marine police headquarters tip kowloon peninsula hotel welcome development house five restaurants wonderful massive suites bit sparse magnificent little bed wooden floorboards wallmounted tv fireplace stayed suite hung modern art white breakfast veranda parlour overlooking banyan trees historical artifacts shopping plaza beneath hotel start day house rarity world surrounded highrise hitech hong kong unexpected treasure

Reviews.Title: “WOW, WOW, WOW”
Reviews.Author: Swisswifey
Reviews.Content: live hk trip friends husband wed stayed hotels island decided treat ourselves stay house stayed 6 nights swapped halfway change decorated balconies views hk island luxurious beds super overslept missed breakfast twice luckily breakfast runs till 1130 hotel amazingly decorated staff fabulous breakfast probably scrambled eggs invited friends sunday brunch loved brunch free flow champagne choice foods actually trouble saving space desserts esp cheese board hong kong night location star ferry aqua restaurant fave
